name: Ocelot Safari
description:
welcome to the ocelot safari! enjoy the ocelots, and do let us know if you find any long-lost relics in there :)

instructions:

  • hold Z to drag things
  • arrow keys to move
  • make a fire at night!
  • ocelots can crawl through vines and trees – watch out!
  • retrieve that gemstone! some say it’s as far as fvkgl-sbhe meters deep in the jungle!

good luck in there!

made for Ludum Dare 48 (compo), with theme: Deeper and Deeper. This is my first time I've completed a game for Ludum Dare! :D

source code available at https://github.com/pancelor/ocelot-safari
